alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:41PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mendocino County through 815 PM PDT... At 740 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Covelo, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Mendocino County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
